summary: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.
cast: Lea Thompson|Judd Nelson|Dorian Harewood|Frankie Faison|Zoey Deutch|Madelyn Deutch|Gavin DeGraw|Greta Van Susteren|Michael Petted|Peter Patrikios|Scott Boulware|Peter Schmitz|Thomas J. McCarthy|Lexy Rutt|Buck Schirner|Melissa Tepperman|Tom Cleary|Peter Pryor|David Mulholland|Annette Kaplafka|Claire Pires|Joseph Adams|Ian Bell|Stephen Breslin|Diane Cooley|Kevin Cross|Iman Crosson|Tim Curry|Gordon DelGiorno|Crystal Faulkner|Allen Jones|Rod Kim|Dayton Moore|Gregory Nardi|Alice Pires|Stacy Rowe|John Snow|Michelle Williams
title: Mayor Cupcake
